context: Construction company evaluating transition to modular building methods to improve project timelines and quality

request.purpose: Establish modular construction facility and training program for 50% of projects
request.justification: Reduce construction time by 40% and improve quality consistency while addressing labor shortages

decision_process.outcome: Identified strong market demand and competitive advantage potential
Achieved 35% time savings and 90% quality improvement
Comprehensive implementation plan with modular facility design

business_impact.expected_outcome: 40% faster project completion, improved quality consistency, labor cost reduction

lessons_learned: Pilot programs essential for demonstrating value, comprehensive staff training critical for successful technology transition
